Cixian yinyi fanzhou suo fanying de Hanyu yinxi – yi fanben Bore boluomiduo xin jing, Da suiqiu tuoluoni, Fo shuo ruyilun lianhuaxin rulai xiuxing guanmen yi he Miaojixiang pingdeng guanmen dajiaowang jing luechu humo yi wei zhongxin 慈賢音譯梵咒所反映的漢語音系——以梵本《般若波羅蜜多心經》、《大隨求陀羅尼》、《佛說如意輪蓮花心如來修行觀門儀》和《妙吉祥平等觀門大教王經略出護摩儀》為中心 [The Chinese Phonetic System as Reflected in Cixian’s Transliterations of Sanskrit Spells – Focusing on the Sanskrit Versions of the Heart Sutra of the Wisdom of Perfection (Mahāprajñāpāramitā-hṛdaya Sūtra), the Great Dhāraṇī of Wish Fulfillment (Mahāpratisarā Dhāraṇī), the Ritual of Tathāgata’s Cultivating foreign lang="sa" >Avalokitêśvara’s</foreign Wish-Fulfilling Wheel Lotus Heart Method of Contemplation Spoken by the Buddha, and the Fire Rituals Excerpted from the ‘Sutra of the King of the Great Teaching [who Cultivates the] Wonderful and Auspicious, Equal [towards all Beings] Method of Contemplation’].
